title: JavaScript Programming for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of JavaScript programming, from variables and data types to functions and objects. This course is perfect for beginners with no prior programming experience.

speakers.name: Jane Doe
speakers.title: Software Engineer
speakers.bio: Jane Doe is a software engineer with over 5 years of experience. She is passionate about teaching and helping others learn to code.

safety_guidelines: Always wear a mask and social distance during the in-person portion of the course.
Wash your hands frequently with soap and water.
